name: localscreencast
description: PC-to-PC screen mirroring over LAN/WiFi with audio

scripts.build:coturn: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json');pkg.bin='index-coturn.js';require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json',JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2))" && pkg . --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/LocalScreenCast-Server-Coturn/LocalScreenCast.exe && node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json');pkg.bin='index-nodeturn.js';require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json',JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2))" && npm run postbuild:coturn
scripts.postbuild:coturn: cpx "public/**/*" dist/LocalScreenCast-Server-Coturn/public && cpx "LICENSE" dist/LocalScreenCast-Server-Coturn && cpx "README.md" dist/LocalScreenCast-Server-Coturn && cpx "certgen/**/*" dist/LocalScreenCast-Server-Coturn/certgen && cpx "coturn/**/*" dist/LocalScreenCast-Server-Coturn/coturn
scripts.postbuild:nodeturn: cpx "public/**/*" dist/LocalScreenCast-Server-NodeTurn/public && cpx "LICENSE" dist/LocalScreenCast-Server-NodeTurn && cpx "README.md" dist/LocalScreenCast-Server-NodeTurn && cpx "certgen/**/*" dist/LocalScreenCast-Server-NodeTurn/certgen
